metadata.label: run
metadata.description: Executes the agent for a given user query.

tools.name: set
tools.description: The `Client.get()` function can be used to send HTTP GET requests to HTTP endpoints.

agent.systemPrompt: {role: "Math tutor", instructions: "Help the students with their questions."}

codedata.sourceCode: string result = check agent->run("What is the sum of 1 and 2?");

metadata.description: AzureOpenAiProvider is a client class that provides an interface for interacting with Azure-hosted OpenAI language models.

codedata.sourceCode: ai:AzureOpenAiProvider myModel = check new ({auth: {apiKey}}, serviceUrl, deploymentId, apiVersion);

metadata.label: Service URL
metadata.description: The base URL of Azure OpenAI API endpoint

diagnostics.message: a type compatible with mapping constructor expressions not found in type 'string'

metadata.label: API Key
metadata.description: The Azure OpenAI API key

metadata.label: Deployment ID
metadata.description: The deployment identifier for the specific model deployment in Azure

metadata.label: API Version
metadata.description: The Azure OpenAI API version (e.g., "2023-07-01-preview")

metadata.label: Maximum Tokens
metadata.description: The upper limit for the number of tokens in the response generated by the model

metadata.label: Temperature
metadata.description: The temperature for controlling randomness in the model's output

metadata.label: HTTP Version
metadata.description: The HTTP version understood by the client

metadata.label: HTTP1 Settings
metadata.description: Configurations related to HTTP/1.x protocol

metadata.label: HTTP2 Settings
metadata.description: Configurations related to HTTP/2 protocol

metadata.label: Timeout
metadata.description: The maximum time to wait (in seconds) for a response before closing the connection

metadata.label: Forwarded
metadata.description: The choice of setting `forwarded`/`x-forwarded` header

metadata.label: Pool Configuration
metadata.description: Configurations associated with request pooling

metadata.label: Cache Configuration
metadata.description: HTTP caching related configurations

metadata.label: Compression
metadata.description: Specifies the way of handling compression (`accept-encoding`) header

metadata.label: Circuit Breaker Configuration
metadata.description: Configurations associated with the behaviour of the Circuit Breaker

metadata.label: Retry Configuration
metadata.description: Configurations associated with retrying

metadata.label: Response Limit Configuration
metadata.description: Configurations associated with inbound response size limits

metadata.label: Secure Socket Configuration
metadata.description: SSL/TLS-related options

metadata.label: Proxy Configuration
metadata.description: Proxy server related options

metadata.label: Payload Validation
metadata.description: Enables the inbound payload validation functionality which provided by the constraint package. Enabled by default
